citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The required semiannual evaluation by the research facility for spring 2023 was not available for inspection. The spring
2024 semiannual report was not signed by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC)
members at the time of inspection. The IACUC needs to ensure the semiannual report is complete and ensure the report
is signed by a majority of IACUC members in accordance with the Animal Welfare Act. The semi-annual evaluation report
to the Institutional Official (IO) functions as notification of the overall status of the facility and any identified deficiencies to
the IO so that the IO can determine that the IACUC is able to ensure the humane care and use of animals. Corrected
during inspection, 13 June 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative.
Additional Inspectors:
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Leann Sargeant, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The required semiannual evaluation by the research facility for spring 2023 was not available for inspection. The spring 
2024 semiannual report was not signed by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) 
members at the time of inspection. The IACUC needs to ensure the semiannual report is complete and ensure the report 
is signed by a majority of IACUC members in accordance with the Animal Welfare Act. The semi-annual evaluation report 
to the Institutional Official (IO) functions as notification of the overall status of the facility and any identified deficiencies to 
the IO so that the IO can determine that the IACUC is able to ensure the humane care and use of animals. Corrected 
during inspection, 13 June 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Leann Sargeant, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
